title: Is there any reason to put 3-4 ai bots on the players team when trying to level in co-op vs ai
body: Im trying to level and the last 5-6 games have had 3-4 AI bots on my team its impossible to win so what is the point its 20 mins minimum wasted.

replies.body: This actually has nothing to do with Riot. They're player accounts being controlled by AI for the purpose of levelling accounts, usually for sale (which is actually illegal). They're a real problem in pre-30 Coop VS AI and ARAM games, more so on OCE. Just report and move on is the best thing you can do really.

Actually selling accounts is a direct violation of the League of Legends Terms of Use. You can read more about that [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse). It's in Section 3 part D, or just Control F and search for "Account Sales". 
Just wanted to clear that up.
Ha wow, my bad, I mis-read your post :P I guess we have a source now at least, in case the OP wants to read more into it.

That really sucks man, make sure you report them at the end of each game. Once you get to level 20 and higher they start to go away a bit. Also playing at peak hours, 3pm onwards, will reduce the chances of you getting matched with bots.
